name: methane_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool atmosphere_methane_concentration.
Tool description: This API provides on a monthly basis, the amount of methane in the atmosphere from 1983 to the present. Expressed as a mole fraction in dry air, parts per million (ppm).
API description: Fetches methane concentration data from the specified API endpoint using the RapidAPI service.

methane.description: Optional parameter to specify a particular methane concentration. Defaults to None.
